description: Bohemians are a civilization focused on gunpowder units and strong economy bonuses.
dark_age: Start with 4 villagers and a scout.
Build 2 houses, a mill near berries, a lumber camp near forest and a mining camp near gold mine.
Train additional villagers from the town center.
Train 2-3 archers from the archery range and use them to defend your base.
Use the scout to explore the map and find resources.
Assign 7-8 villagers to food, 4-5 to wood, 1-2 to gold, and 1-2 to stone.
Advance to Feudal Age at around 22-23 minutes with 500 food and 200 gold.
Have around 1000-1200 food, 200-250 wood, 100-150 gold, and 50-75 stone at the end of the Dark Age.
feudal_age: Build additional archery ranges and produce crossbows and skirmishers.
Add more houses and farms to your base as well as more lumber camps and mining camps.
Research feudal age upgrades for archers and infantry.
Build a market and start selling excess resources for gold.
Advance to Castle Age at around 27-28 minutes with 800 food and 400 gold.
Have around 2000-2500 food, 800-1000 wood, 400-500 gold, and 200-250 stone at the end of the Feudal Age.
Assign 10-12 villagers to food, 8-9 to wood, 2-3 to gold, and 3-4 to stone.
Have 8-10 villagers gathering gold and 8-10 gathering wood.
castle_age: Build additional castles and produce unique unit, the Hussite Wagon, and Hand Cannoneers.
Research castle age upgrades for gunpowder units and blacksmith upgrades for archers.
Build a monastery and start producing monks to heal and convert enemy units.
Advance to Imperial Age at around 35-36 minutes with 1000 food, 1000 gold, and 800 stone.
Have around 4000-4500 food, 2500-3000 wood, 1500-2000 gold, and 1000-1200 stone at the end of the Castle Age.
Assign 25-30 villagers to food, 20-22 to wood, 4-5 to gold, and 8-10 to stone.
Have 16-20 villagers gathering gold and 16-20 gathering wood.
imperial_age: Train Hussite Wagons and Hand Cannoneers, and upgrade them with the unique technology, Bearded Axe.
Use the Hussite Wagon as a mobile siege weapon and Hand Cannoneers to counter enemy infantry.
Have around 8000-9000 food, 5000-6000 wood, 3000-4000 gold, and 2000-2500 stone at the end of the Imperial Age.
Assign 50-60 villagers to food, 40-45 to wood, 8-10 to gold, and 16-20 to stone.
